summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingOak Essentials Nourishing Cleansing Milk is a creamy cleansing milk with Oat Amino Acids that gently sweep away dirt, oil, and makeup without over-drying skin. It helps to balance skin’s pH and acts as a filter to help reduce the effects of hard water while supporting skin’s natural lipid layer.
details: DetailsKey IngredientsOat Amino Acids: gently cleanse, calm and soften skin, while helping to replenish moisture for a fresh, hydrated finish without leaving skin feeling tight or dryL-glutamic Acid: acts as a filter to help reduce the effects of hard water and balance skin’s pH and moisture levelsRice Bran & Rosemary Seed Extract: rich in antioxidants and vitamins that nourish and soothe skin and help reduce the effects of free radical damage for a healthier-looking complexionFormulated WithoutMade simply and without compromise, Oak Essentials skincare formulas are non-GMO and organic whenever possible, and always formulated without silicones, colorants, sulfates, phthalates, parabens, PEGs, petrolatum, mineral oil, and nanoparticles.Item 2631910How To UseUse AM & PM daily. Apply 1-2 pumps to damp skin and massage using circular motions. Rinse off with water and pat skin dry. Follow with your routine essentials and Moisture Rich Balm.TIP: For a spa-like experience, dampen a cotton pad with Balancing Mist and then apply 2-3 pumps of Nourishing Milk Cleanser. Start at the center of the face using circular motions and work towards the outer corners. Repeat until skin is clean and refreshed.Warning: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water immediately. Do not ingest. Do not store at elevated temperatures.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, DecylGlucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Cetearyl Olivate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Sorbitan Olivate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino Acids, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Fragrance (Parfum).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use AM & PM daily. Apply 1-2 pumps to damp skin and massage using circular motions. Rinse off with water and pat skin dry. Follow with your routine essentials and Moisture Rich Balm.TIP: For a spa-like experience, dampen a cotton pad with Balancing Mist and then apply 2-3 pumps of Nourishing Milk Cleanser. Start at the center of the face using circular motions and work towards the outer corners. Repeat until skin is clean and refreshed.Warning: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid direct contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse with water immediately. Do not ingest. Do not store at elevated temperatures.

reviews.headline: Great Cleanser, Terrible Packaging!
reviews.comments: It is my hope that this feedback is shared with Oak Essentials.  This cleanser is wonderful, creamy and lightweight.  Does not dry out my skin and smells like a day at the spa.  I am 61 years young with combo skin.  The reason I took one star off is the heavy glass bottle.  Please re-think your packaging to something not so heavy.  Also, the lid slides off easily and that is another issue.  Need to carefully hold it or the bottle will end up on the ground.  Happened to me twice.

reviews.headline: New favorite cleanser!
reviews.comments: Im an esthetician so im pretty picky when it comes to products. Im almoat finished with my first bottle and its teally made a difference with my skin. Im acne prone and very senstive and this one has made my skin so happy and glowy and has not made me more oily like most creamy cleansers. I hope they eventually sell a refill pouch or a smalelr travel size option
